Topic: Draw a habitat and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a specific habitat, showing both land and water environments.
The student can include various types of living things in their drawing, such as plants and animals, that are commonly found in the chosen habitat.
The student can illustrate patterns in how different living things are distributed within the habitat.
The student can compare and label different types of living things, showing diversity within the habitat.
